summary: A widower sends daily reminders to the petty criminal who killed his wife in a traffic accident that on the anniversary of her death, he will kill him.
cast: Masato Sakai|Takayuki Yamada|Sakura Andô|Hirofumi Arai|Gô Ayano|Denden|Haruka Kinami|Katsuya Kobayashi|Daisuke Kuroda|Rie Minemura|Maki Sakai|Tomorô Taguchi|Tsutomu Takahashi|Mitsuki Tanimura|Kinuo Yamada
title: Sono yoru no samurai
